title: New Honor System Question (That wasn't answered)
body: I've played quite a few games with the new honor system and have gotten quite a bit of teams that have all honored one person (I always get 2 and it feels like Overwatch getting 9 as support but one person doesn't vote ;w;) and the icon doesn't change at all. Will there be some type of progress bar to tell me when I'm close to leveling up? I don't really want it to be a surprise kind of thing because I want to get excited and gloat to my friends about how I'm close to being higher honor than just ending a game, possibly a bad one it just popping in my face "HONOR LEVEL 3! AREN'T YOU JUST SO HAPPY!?"

replies.body: At the moment there isn't a way to see how close you are to the next honor level, but a progress bar is definitely something we could add in the future!

I was thinking it would be cool if you know how the lines appear on the Level 5, that should be the progress bar, it would be a neat way to show progress that fits with the theme instead of just a bar tacted on like experience.
